tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_ratings (
    rating_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recipe_id INT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
	rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	recipe_id INT,
	rating FLOAT,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Rating (
	rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	recipe_id INT,
	rating INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User(user_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES Recipe(recipe_id)
);
Recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), recipe_description TEXT, chef_name VARCHAR(100), cook_time_minutes INT, difficulty_level VARCHAR(50))
Ratings (rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_id INT, user_id INT, rating FLOAT, comments TEXT))
Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(255), registration_date DATE))
Favorites (favorite_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, recipe_id INT))
Recommendations (recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, recommended_recipe_id INT))
